name: FinancialInsecurityScreeningAssessmentsAndQuestions
title: Financial Insecurity Screening Assessments And Questions
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values represents screening assessments and questions for Financial Insecurity as selected by the Gravity Project.),(Data Element Scope: This set of values may be used to represent screening assessment questions in observations, questionnaires, and questionnaire responses for this SDOH domain (e.g., for the SDOHCC Observation Screening Response profile in the Gravity SDOH Clinical Care FHIR Implementation Guide).),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes LOINC codes for SDOH screening assessments and questions as selected by the Gravity Project.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes the questions not selected by the Gravity Project from SDOH screening assessments.)

contains.display: How hard is it for you to pay for the very basics like food, housing, medical care, and heating
Trouble paying heating bill AndOr electricity bill Caregiver
Would like help with paying heating AndOr electricity bill Caregiver
Accountable health communities (AHC) health-related social needs (HRSN) supplemental questions
